block.p: Manhattan

CHELSEA $995,000 252 Seventh Avenue (25th Street) (Chelsea Mercantile) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 861-sq.-ft. condo in a renovated prewar loft building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; renovated kitchen and bath, high ceilings, north exposure; health club and roof deck in building; common charge $415; taxes $3,780; listed at $995,000, 17 weeks on market (brokers: Prudential Douglas Elliman; JC Deniro & Associates)

WEST SIDE $2.3 million 220 Riverside Boulevard (71st Street) (Trump Place) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,429-sq.-ft. condo in a 4-year-old building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; dining room, oversize windows, south and east exposures; fitness center with lap pool and children's playroom in building; common charge $1,087; taxes $5,292; listed at $2.3 million, 30 weeks on market (broker: Citi Habitats New York)
UPPER EAST SIDE

$690,000 35 East 85th Street (Westminster House) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 800-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen; renovated kitchen and bath, 3 exposures; maintenance $928, 55% tax deductible; listed at $699,000, 30 weeks on market (broker: Prudential Douglas Elliman)
HUDSON HEIGHTS

$560,000 116 Pinehurst Avenue (185th Street) (Hudson View Gardens) 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,050-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; entry foyer, windowed dining area, renovated kitchen, 8 1/2-ft. ceilings, hardwood floors, 3 exposures, partial Hudson River view; community room and 5 acres of common grounds in complex; maintenance $1,198, includes gas and electricity; listed at $580,000, 9 weeks on market (broker: Simone Song Properties)
Bronx

SPUYTEN DUYVIL $600,000 750 Kappock Street (Glenbriar) 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,600-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; windowed dining area, renovated kitchen, 3 exposures; maintenance $1,222, includes indoor parking space, 50% tax deductible; listed at $699,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Trebach Realty)
Brooklyn
DITMAS PARK

$235,000 570 Westminster Road 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 850-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen; dining area, eat-in kitchen, 2 exposures, laundry in building; maintenance $480, 45% tax deductible; listed at $235,000, 2 weeks on market (broker: Brooklyn Hearth Realty)

PARK SLOPE $849,000 1017 Eighth Avenue 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. duplex co-op in a prewar building; dining room, living room with fireplace, renovated baths, recreation room, hardwood floors, laundry, private garden; maintenance $830, 40% tax deductible; listed at $849,000, 6 weeks on market (broker: Coldwell Banker Hunt Kennedy & Garfield)
Queens

BEECHHURST $978,000 160-10 Riverside Drive 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 67-year-old brick-sided colonial-style house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, living room with fireplace, den, semifinished basement; balcony; 1-car garage; 59-by-120-ft. lot; taxes $4,788; listed at $1.09 million, 16 weeks on market (brokers: Jackie Wong Real Estate; PCA Realty)
Connecticut

GREENWICH $5.5 million 9 Mackenzie Glen 6-bedroom, 7 1/2-bath, newly constructed wood-sided Tudor-style house; dining room, eat-in kitchen with pantry, library, playroom, steam shower in master bath; stone terrace, 3-car garage; 1.22-acre lot; taxes not yet assessed; listed at $5.5 million, 10 weeks on market (broker: Coldwell Banker Curtis)
California

BEVERLY HILLS $11.75 million 707 North Hillcrest Road 7-bedroom, 9-bath, 18-year-old stucco-sided Tuscan villa-style house; 2-story entry foyer, dining room, eat-in kitchen with breakfast room, family room, bonus room, home gym, Italian limestone floors, his and her baths off master bedroom suite; rear patio, heated pool; 1/2-acre lot; taxes $133,950; listed at $11,995 million, 2 weeks on market (broker: Prudential California Realty)
LOS ANGELES

$615,000 3725 Military Avenue 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 56-year-old 1-story stucco-sided house; dining area, eat-in kitchen, living room; needs work; 1-car garage; 49-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $7,171; listed at $629,000, 13 weeks on market (broker: Prudential California Realty)

LOS ANGELES $786,000 7878 Croydon Avenue 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 63-year-old 1-story wood-sided house; dining area, renovated kitchen and bath, family room with gas fireplace; new roof, covered patio, 2-car garage; 50-by-127-ft. lot; taxes $8,960; listed at $779,000 (multiple bids), 4 weeks on market (brokers: Coldwell Banker Westchester; Coldwell Banker Santa Monica)

LOS ANGELES $1.6 million 1933 Westholme Avenue 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 77-year-old 2-story stucco-sided Spanish-style house; eat-in kitchen with breakfast area, library; 2-car garage; 0.12-acre lot; taxes $18,240; listed at $1.65 million, 9 weeks on market (broker: Prudential California Realty)

CULVER CITY $627,900 5372 Etheldo Avenue 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 56-year-old 1-story wood-frame house; needs work; 2-car garage; 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $7,158; listed at $645,000, 13 weeks on market (broker: Prudential California Realty)
Manhattan
